node.text: WILSON WNBA Heir Series Basketballs - Women's Official, Size 6-28.5"

Thrilling athleticism. Non-stop creativity. Inspiring camaraderie. One tip-off at a time The NBA continues on, building upon its thriving legacy of competition, innovation and community. Driven to give our best to the game of basketball and the people who power this culture, Wilson proudly returns to the court, once again suiting up as the official basketball of the NBA.

Inspired by the drive that lives inside every NBA hopeful. The Wilson NBA DRV Basketball is designed for outdoor play and built to stand up to the elements. Inflation retention lining creates longer lasting air retention with this ball designed for ultimate outdoor durability.
New channel construction suited to player preference for today's game.
Designed for ultimate outdoor durability with an exterior construction resistant to the elements.
The Wilson NBA DRV Basketball is designed for outdoor play and built to stand up to the elements
NBA DRV PLUS: Designed for outdoor courts, the performance cover provides grip even on the roughest surface
NBA DRV PRO: The Tackskin Cover offers a new cushion layer with ultimate grip in all weather conditions.

Inspired by the drive that lives inside every NBA hopeful. The Wilson NBA DRV Basketball is designed for outdoor play and built to stand up to the elements. Inflation retention lining creates longer lasting air retention with this ball designed for ultimate outdoor durability.
Wilson NBA DRV Series Basketball - DRV, Brown, Size 5 - 27.5"
NBA OFFICIAL: Wilson is the official basketball of the NBA. This ball features official NBA branding coupled with the iconic Wilson script
PERFORMANCE COVER: Outdoor cover designed for grip on rough surfaces
OUTDOOR DURABILITY: Designed for ultimate outdoor durability
AIR RETENTION: Inflation retention lining creats longer lasting air retention
NBA PRO SEAMS: New channel construction suited to player preference

node.content-desc: Customer reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 13,778 global ratings

node.text: Customers find the basketball durable, well-suited for kids with its right size for tiny hands, and appreciate its grip and bounce. They consider it good value for money. The air retention and pump features receive mixed feedback - while some say it inflates at the right amount and comes with a pump, others report it doesn't hold air and lacks a needle. The functionality also gets mixed reviews, with some saying it performs reasonably well indoors while others find it unusable.

Top reviews from the United States
Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2025

The Wilson Basketball is a fantastic choice for any basketball player. With its premium composite leather cover, it offers a soft feel and excellent grip. Whether indoors or outdoors, this basketball delivers a reliable bounce, perfect for layups and three-pointers....
Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024

exceptional grip, allowing for incredible control and confidence in every dribble, pass, and shot. This durable ball, built for both indoor and outdoor use, boasts a perfect bounce consistency and official size and weight, making it ideal for practice or competitive play....
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2025

This basketball is perfect for outdoor play! The grip is fantastic, and it holds air well, providing consistent bounce. Durable and designed for great handling, its ideal for both casual and competitive games.
Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2024
Bought it for my pre teen daughter. The texture, durability, bounce, grip and value for money is all good. However in the short time she's had it. It has to be inflated every week.
Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025

Heres the deal, basketball is great. Feels great and looks great, I unfortunately cant play with it because of a spinal cord injury. Im trying to get my daughter to use it, she has played before, but she is more interested in band and her clarinet.
Report review by Howard M Rothman
Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2025
Great value and awesome quality for a great value
Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025

Good price. I liked the colors offered. My boys like them and they are great practice balls. They bounce well and look to be pretty durable compared to other balls of similar price. Id recommend to others.
Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2024
It didnt come fully inflated, so needed to have air added. Overall, a good feeling ball. Cool color pattern. Good value for the money.
Calidad muy buena me gusta la textura
Vale muito a pena, podem comprar.
A bola excelente, tem um bom grip, o custo x benefcio bom. Fiquei bem satisfeito.
No est seguro de comprarlo pero no me arrepiento. Muy buen grip y el diseo es bonito.
Compre el balon y es realmente muy bueno y agradable al tacto para estar tirando
Report review by Maria Eliza Martins de Melo
